title: Encapsulate root page sentinel and improve missing key error
description: Avoid magic -1L for no-root. Expose DB.hasRoot() or constant. In Transaction.get, return domain-specific KeyNotFound with context.

title: Cache data file size and remove expensive md5 trace
description: Environment.init logs md5 by reading entire file, which is expensive. Cache file size in a val and remove or guard md5 under debug-only flag.

title: Deterministic metadata page selection on equal txnId
description: latestMetadataPage() should handle equal txnId deterministically and add corruption checks rather than defaulting to second.

title: Fix detected page size message
description: In Environment.init, assertion message uses  instead of . Update to avoid misleading error output.

title: Testing: add corrupted metadata and page-size boundary tests
description: Add tests covering bad magic/version, page-size detection failures, and endianness behavior.

title: Remove unused Environment.Range
description: Range data class appears unused. Remove to reduce clutter or implement where intended.

title: Document key ordering and ByteArrayKey compare
description: Ensure ordering matches LMDBâ€™s lexicographic byte compare. Add docs and tests for edge cases.

title: Reuse DbMappedBuffer during page-size probing
description: getMetadataPagesWithPageSize creates multiple DbMappedBuffer instances. Reuse a single instance per page size to reduce overhead.

title: CLI dump: add --out-dir, filename safety, overwrite option
description: Dump currently writes into LMDB dir with Base64 filenames and CREATE_NEW. Add --out-dir, URL-safe filenames without padding, and --overwrite handling with error reporting.

title: Lock file handling semantics
description: Currently locking is disabled and code path is contradictory. Define clear semantics: read-only should not require lock.mdb; implement optional validation when enabling locking.

title: Refactor Page types to sealed classes
description: Use sealed class hierarchy for Page to improve exhaustiveness and simplify factory logic.

title: Default ByteOrder to LITTLE_ENDIAN
description: LMDB on-disk format is little-endian. Using ByteOrder.nativeOrder() can misread on big-endian systems. Default to LITTLE_ENDIAN with optional override.

title: Add closed-state checks to Environment
description: Prevent using DbMappedBuffer/ByteBuffer after Environment.close by tracking closed state and guarding methods.
